content.text:
# Calliostoma milneedwardsi

Calliostoma milneedwardsi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Calliostomatidae.
Description
The height of the shell attains 44 mm.
Distribution
This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off Mauritania.
References
* [https://archive.org/details/mollusquestestac12loca  Locard A. (1898). Expéditions scientifiques du Travailleur et du Talisman pendant les années 1880, 1881, 1882 et 1883. Mollusques testacés. Paris, Masson.vol. 2 [1898], pp. 1–515, pl. 1–18]
